title: Feature: A/B Testing Framework
acceptance_criteria:
- Hash-based variant assignment (consistent per client)
- Support for prompt style variants (direct vs Socratic)
- Support for question count variants (1 vs 2-3)
- Variant logged in Opik traces
- Comparison dashboard in Opik

title: Feature: Context Gathering
acceptance_criteria:
- Determines time of day category (morning, afternoon, evening, night, late_night)
- Retrieves recent purchase count in same category
- Gets user's friction level preference
- Retrieves active goal name (without exposing amount)
- Bundles context into anonymized request format

---

title: Feature: Response Parsing
acceptance_criteria:
- Parses JSON response from Claude
- Extracts questions array
- Extracts goal impact data (delay days, new progress)
- Extracts risk level (low, medium, high)
- Handles malformed responses gracefully with fallbacks

---

title: Feature: Cooling-Off List View
acceptance_criteria:
- List all pending cooling-off items
- Show countdown timer for each item
- "Still Want It" button to proceed to purchase
- "Remove" button to delete item
- "Expired" state for items past 48 hours
- Sort by expiration time

---

title: Feature: Cooling-Off Notifications
acceptance_criteria:
- Chrome notification after 48 hours
- Shows product name and image
- "View Item" action opens product URL
- "Remove" action deletes from list
- Respects user notification preferences

---

title: Feature: Save to Cooling-Off List
acceptance_criteria:
- One-click save from reflection overlay
- Store product name, price, URL, image
- Set 48-hour expiration timestamp
- Show confirmation toast on save
- Prevent duplicate saves of same URL

---

title: Feature: URL Pattern Detection
acceptance_criteria:
- Detects /checkout, /cart, /payment URL patterns
- Supports major sites: Amazon, Shopify, eBay, Walmart, Target
- Returns confidence score (0-30 points) based on URL match
- Handles URL changes via History API and navigation events

---

title: Feature: Fallback Question System
acceptance_criteria:
- 5+ generic fallback questions defined
- Random selection of 2-3 fallbacks
- Triggered on API timeout (5 seconds)
- Triggered on rate limit exceeded
- Triggered on invalid API response

---

title: Feature: Configure Tailwind CSS
acceptance_criteria:
- Tailwind CSS installed and configured
- Custom color palette defined (forest-green, fresh-green, sage, terracotta, clay)
- CSS variables set up in globals.css
- Tailwind config extended with brand colors and gradients

---

title: Feature: Claude API Integration
acceptance_criteria:
- Uses @anthropic-ai/sdk
- Calls claude-3-haiku-20240307 model
- 300 max tokens, 0.7 temperature
- 5 second timeout with retry
- Returns fallback questions on API failure

---

title: Feature: Outcome Tracking
acceptance_criteria:
- Client reports outcome after user decision
- Outcome linked to original trace via eventId
- Enables correlation of question quality with outcomes
- Supports A/B test analysis
- Privacy-preserving (no PII in reports)

---

title: Feature: User Profile Storage
acceptance_criteria:
- UserProfile interface matches architecture spec
- Generate anonymous UUID on first install
- Store/retrieve from chrome.storage.local
- Settings include frictionLevel (1-5), enabledSites, quietHours, notifications
- Syncs across extension components

---

title: Feature: Goal Management UI
acceptance_criteria:
- List of all goals with progress bars
- Create new goal form (name, amount, deadline, priority)
- Edit existing goals
- Delete goals with confirmation
- Goal progress visualization
- Days remaining calculation

---

title: Feature: Extension Popup UI
acceptance_criteria:
- Stats card with gradient background
- Money saved today/week/month display
- Current streak counter
- Toggle to enable/disable extension
- Cooling-off list count with link to full list
- Settings gear icon linking to dashboard

---

title: Feature: Initialize Plasmo Extension Project
acceptance_criteria:
- Plasmo project initialized with `pnpm create plasmo`
- TypeScript configured with strict mode
- Project builds successfully with `pnpm build`
- Extension loads in Chrome without errors
- Basic manifest.json with required permissions

---

title: Feature: Button Text Detection
acceptance_criteria:
- Detects common purchase button text patterns
- Case-insensitive matching
- Returns confidence score (0-40 points) based on matches
- Handles dynamically loaded buttons via MutationObserver

---

title: Feature: Set Up Zustand State Management
acceptance_criteria:
- Zustand installed and configured
- Chrome Storage middleware implemented
- Base store structure created matching data model from architecture doc
- State syncs correctly between popup, dashboard, and background script

---

title: Feature: DOM Structure Analysis
acceptance_criteria:
- Detects payment form elements (credit card inputs)
- Identifies cart total displays
- Recognizes order summary sections
- Returns confidence score (0-30 points) based on DOM analysis

---

title: Feature: Site-Specific Detectors
acceptance_criteria:
- Amazon detector with specific selectors
- Shopify generic detector (works across Shopify stores)
- eBay, Walmart, Target, Best Buy detectors
- Etsy, ASOS, Zara, H&M detectors
- Each detector includes product extraction selectors

---

title: Feature: Cooling-Off Statistics
acceptance_criteria:
- Track items that expired without purchase
- Calculate percentage "saved by waiting"
- Calculate total money saved via cooling off
- Display stats in dashboard
- Include in overall savings metrics

---

title: Feature: Evaluation Metrics
acceptance_criteria:
- Question relevance scoring (LLM-as-judge)
- Prevention rate tracking (% purchases prevented)
- User engagement rate (% prompts answered vs dismissed)
- Latency P95 tracking (target < 2 seconds)
- Cost per request calculation

---

title: Feature: Product Info Extraction
acceptance_criteria:
- Extracts product name from page
- Extracts price (handles various formats)
- Determines product category when possible
- Extracts product image URL
- Works across supported e-commerce sites

---

title: Feature: Stats Card Component
acceptance_criteria:
- Gradient background (forest to fresh green)
- Large metric number display
- Subtitle/label text
- Icon support
- Multiple size variants

---

title: Feature: Dashboard Layout
acceptance_criteria:
- Clean layout with sidebar navigation
- Sections: Overview, Goals, Patterns, Cooling-Off, Settings
- Responsive design (works in popup and full tab)
- Consistent styling with brand colors
- Header with PauseBuy branding

---

title: Feature: Financial Goals Storage
acceptance_criteria:
- FinancialGoal interface matches architecture spec
- Create goal with name, target, deadline, priority
- Update current amount and goal details
- Delete goals
- List all goals sorted by priority
- Calculate progress percentage

---

title: Feature: Detection Confidence Scoring
acceptance_criteria:
- Combines scores from all detection methods
- Configurable threshold (default 60)
- Debounces rapid detections
- Logs detection events for debugging
- Sends PURCHASE_DETECTED message to service worker

---

title: Feature: Client Proxy Module
acceptance_criteria:
- callProxyAPI function in background script
- Sends X-Client-Id header for rate limiting
- Handles 429 rate limit responses
- Handles network errors with fallbacks
- Parses and returns ReflectionResponse

---
close_reason: Created lib/api.ts with callProxyAPI, rate limit handling, fallbacks, and context gathering. Updated background.ts to use API module.

title: Feature: Request Validation
acceptance_criteria:
- ProductSchema validates name, price, category
- ContextSchema validates timeOfDay, goalName, frictionLevel
- ReflectionRequestSchema combines both
- Returns 400 with validation errors for invalid requests
- Sanitizes input to prevent injection

---

title: Feature: Reflection Overlay Component
acceptance_criteria:
- Semi-transparent dark overlay (rgba(26,26,26,0.92))
- Displays product name and price
- Shows 2-3 reflection questions with green accent
- Shows goal impact with progress bar
- "Save for Later" and "I Still Want It" buttons
- Dismiss button (X) in corner
- Animates in smoothly

---
close_reason: Created overlay.tsx with semi-transparent overlay, product info, reflection questions, goal impact visualization, and Save for Later / I Still Want It buttons with animations

title: Feature: Button Components
acceptance_criteria:
- Primary button (forest green)
- Secondary button (outlined)
- Success button (fresh green)
- Warning button (terracotta)
- Hover states with transform and shadow
- Focus states for accessibility
- Loading state variant

---

title: Feature: Configure Development Tooling
acceptance_criteria:
- ESLint configured with TypeScript rules
- Prettier configured for consistent formatting
- Vitest set up for unit testing
- Playwright configured for E2E testing
- Basic test commands work: `pnpm test`, `pnpm lint`

---

title: Feature: Prompt Engineering System
acceptance_criteria:
- System prompt includes user context (goals, time, category)
- Generates 2-3 contextual questions per trigger
- Questions are empathetic and non-judgmental
- Handles edge cases (no goals set, unknown category)
- Response format is structured JSON

---
close_reason: Implemented in backend/lib/claude.ts with buildPrompt() including all context, 2-3 questions, empathetic tone, edge case handling, and JSON response format

title: Feature: Savings Overview Section
acceptance_criteria:
- Total money saved (all time, this month, this week)
- Number of impulse purchases prevented
- Current streak (consecutive days resisting)
- Savings chart over time (Recharts)
- Comparison to previous period

---

title: Feature: Opik Tracing Integration
acceptance_criteria:
- Opik SDK initialized in backend
- All Claude calls traced with spans
- Metadata includes: product, category, price, clientId
- Token usage tracked per call
- Latency measured and logged

---

title: Feature: Goal Impact Calculator
acceptance_criteria:
- Calculate days delayed for each goal based on purchase price
- Calculate new progress percentage after purchase
- Consider goal deadline in calculations
- Return most relevant goal impact for display
- Handle multiple goals with priorities

---

title: Feature: Achievement Badges
acceptance_criteria:
- Badge component with icon and label
- Streak badges (3, 7, 14, 30 days)
- Savings badges ($50, $100, $500, $1000)
- Milestone badges (10, 50, 100 impulses resisted)
- Unlock animation
- Badge collection view

---

title: Feature: Purchase Event Logging
acceptance_criteria:
- PurchaseEvent interface matches architecture spec
- Log event on every detection trigger
- Record outcome when user makes decision
- Store questions asked and any user responses
- Track reflection time (seconds on overlay)
- Query events by date range, category, outcome

---

title: Feature: Vercel Edge Function Setup
acceptance_criteria:
- Vercel project initialized in /backend directory
- Edge function responds at /api/generate
- CORS configured for Chrome extension origin
- Environment variables configured for API keys
- Deploys successfully to Vercel

---

title: Feature: Rate Limiting
acceptance_criteria:
- Rate limit of 100 requests/day per client
- Uses Vercel KV for distributed state
- Returns 429 with reset time when exceeded
- X-RateLimit-Remaining header in responses
- 24-hour sliding window

---
close_reason: Implemented rate limiting with Vercel KV: 100 req/day sliding window, 429 response with reset time, X-RateLimit-* headers
